tweet: My children are Native Central American.  I have always felt that Thanksgiving is only thankful for part of America and don't like the day.
I finished my novel yesterday for nano, but am still 7K shy.  Decided to make an alternate ending were everything is wonky.
That is so lame. I saw you bought a cool cane, do people give you their seet?
Had the period talk with my nine year old and six year old.  Fun stuff.
Briefly considered having the end of the book take a sharp downwards turn.
